description:
fmt: don't check for nil when printing arrays as Go syntax.

Also add array values to printing test suite.
Fixes issue 2468.

messages.text:

fmt: don't check for nil when printing arrays as Go syntax.

Also add array values to printing test suite.
Fixes issue 2468.
